name: malignant
content:
malignant adjective
(DISEASE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A malignant disease or growth is cancer or is related to cancer, and is likely to be harmful: The process by which malignant cancer cells multiply isn't fully understood. Is the tumour malignant or benign? Compare
benign (DISEASE)

malignant adjective
(EVIL)
formal having a strong wish to do harm: He developed a malignant hatred for the land of his birth.

(of a disease or tissue growing because of a disease) leading to death: The pathologist’s report said the tumor was malignant.
